code.description: A status code indicating the result of the operation.

message.description: Additional information or message about the response.

candidateAddress.description: The address of the candidate related to the transaction.

btcAddress.description: The Bitcoin address associated with the transaction.

btcTXId.description: The unique transaction ID for the BTC staking transaction.

confirmedTxHash.description: The confirmed transaction hash for the BTC transaction.

btcAmount.description: The amount of BTC staked in the transaction.

script.description: The script associated with the transaction.

startRound.description: The starting round of the transaction.

endRound.description: The ending round of the transaction.

delegateRound.description: The delegate round for the transaction.

outputIndex.description: The output index for the transaction.

rewardAddress.description: The reward address associated with the transaction.

unlockTime.description: The unlock time for the transaction.

redeemAddress.description: The redeem address for the transaction.

redeemTxId.description: The transaction ID for the redeem transaction.

pkHash.description: Public key hash associated with the given Bitcoin address.

400.description: An error occurred while retrieving the BTC staking transactions.

code.description: Error code indicating the result of the operation.
